Constants.Standards: City’s Noise Ordinance in Chapter 9.10 of the Municipal Code

Mandatory: Equipment may not be located in front, rear, or interior-side yards
All service equipment must meet the City’s Noise Ordinance
Conditions.Optional: Planning Dept. can waive insulation and housing requirement
Conditions.Conditional logic: Replacement of equipment shall conform to this section where feasible
Conditions.Dependencies: Waiver based on noise specifications, location, and/or other screening or buffering

Exceptions.Explicit deviations: Equipment may encroach into street-side yard up to 6 feet
Exceptions.Alternatives: Waiver of insulation and housing requirement

Relationships.Hierarchical: General rules apply to all noise-producing equipment
Relationships.Logical dependencies: Compliance with City’s Noise Ordinance at the nearest lot line

Conditions.Mandatory: Pool equipment must be within buildable area

Rules.Title: Figure B — Pool equipment & AC unit

Qualifiers.Scope: Placement of pool equipment and AC unit
Qualifiers.Applicability: Pool equipment and AC unit within buildable area

Conditions.Mandatory: Pool equipment and AC unit must be within buildable area

Qualifiers.Scope: Placement of generator and AC unit
Qualifiers.Applicability: Generator and AC unit within buildable area

Conditions.Mandatory: AC unit must be in compliance with regulations
